Html:
am trying to run the sample for outlook, sample works perfectly.
\NetOffice 1.7.4\NetOffice 1.7.4\NET 4.0\Examples\Outlook\C#\Standard Examples

When the outlook is opened and running, i can send email from the Test Example.

But when the outlook is not running, am getting the below exception
{"Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation."}
